0.4.2.name: wordpress/ttftitles
0.4.2.description:
This plugin provides two new template tags to replace plain text with styled text images using TrueType fonts.

This is primarily a reworking of the Image Headlines plugin. Of course, that was a reworking of another plugin by Joel Bennett. The main changes over Brian's plugin are (a) a richer admin interface, (b) the ability to predefine multiple image text styles, and (c) using template tags instead of depending on arguments to the_title.

Anything that works really well probably came from Brian's code. Anything screwed up is probably my fault.
